trans-unit.source: Copies the entire collection to a compatible one-dimensional <xref href="System.Array"></xref>, starting at the specified index of the target array.
The one-dimensional <xref href="System.Array"></xref> that is the destination of the elements copied from <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Array"></xref> must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in array at which copying begins.
Gets a value indicating the number of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref> objects in the collection.
Each <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> object in the collection represents a element in the project.
An integer value representing the number of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref> objects in the collection.
Gets an enumerator that iterates through the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection"></xref>.

This method allows the caller to use the `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) to iterate through the individual <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> objects in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection>.
Gets a value indicating whether access to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe).
`true` if access to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, `false`.
Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection"></xref>.
An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroupCollection"></xref>.
